comments.author: Rob Leary
comments.body: Hey Steve: looks great!!! Thanks so much for capturing the beauty of the season! RL

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Rob, My pleasure. Next time: helmet cam! Have a great wedding and celebration.

comments.author: Matt
comments.body: Amazing fall colors, gentlemen! I would gladly trade a month of wonderful Florida Fall weather for a nice Indian Summer day on the trail in Colorado. The recent temperature drop here from "hellish" to "bearable" has made riding much more attractive in the past couple of weeks. It's still does not compare in any way, shape, or form to the riding back home in Colorado. I truly miss the regular "humblings" I received on both trail and asphalt from the more seasoned Frenz.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Great video chops, Steve-O! I am truly grateful, though, that you were nowhere near my bachelor party. It was somewhat different from this. Hey to Matt, also. I like "seasoned." DU

comments.author: Erica
comments.body: Wow, y'alls were up in my neck of the woods. Great video although I would have liked to see a little more air on some of those jumps. Congratulations Rob! :)
